description.value:
Rose gold and copper rings in this +2 resilient @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Chain Shirt]{Chain Shirt} form a vague bird shape. The jingling links tinkle musically, almost like birdsong. While you wear the armor, effects with the auditory trait must first counteract the harmonic hauberk or they have no effect on you.

The harmonic hauberk attempts to counteract silence spells cast on you and 4thâ€‘level or higher heightened silence spells the first time the armor enters their area (counteract level 4, counteract modifier +20). After failing to counteract a silence spell, the armor can't attempt to counteract the same spell again, even if you leave and enter the spell's area multiple times.

Activate a command;

Frequency once per day;

Requirements You have a pool of Focus Points and at least one @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Composition Spells]{Composition Spells};

Effect You gain 1 Focus Point and immediately use the Focus Point to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Lingering Composition]{Lingering Composition}, using your Performance check to determine the effects of the spell, followed by the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Inspire Defense]{Inspire Defense}. You can use this activation to cast those spells even if you don't have the Lingering Composition or Inspire Defense feats.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
